millomod.title: Millo Mod
millo.feature.auto_command.desc: Automatically inserts an @ in front of your messages
millo.feature.lagslayer.desc: Replaces the actionbar lagslayer with a custom GUI widget
millo.feature.menu_search.desc: Enables a searchbar in menus to highlight named items
millo.feature.notification_tray.desc: Display a tray of information related to this mod
millo.feature.preview_skin.desc: Preview a player skin when hovering over player heads
millo.feature.search.desc: Search through code area for specific actions
millo.feature.tracker.desc: Tracks where on the server you are
millo.feature.show_tags.desc: Shows item tags on items in the tooltip
millo.feature.fs_toggle.desc: Toggles between two flight speeds on a keybind
millo.feature.mode_switcher.desc: A quick mode selector to not have to open chat
millo.feature.cc_plot_fix.desc: Keybind to quickly fix a codeclient bug
millo.feature.not_switcher.desc: Keybind to toggle the NOT state on a conditional block
millo.feature.argument_insert.desc: Create value items within a Menu by right clicking an empty slot
millo.command.settings.desc: Opens the Millo Mod settings menu
millo.command.save.desc: Saves the current dev state (inventory + position)
millo.command.colors.desc: [/col] Opens a custom color wheel for creating colors
millo.command.millo.desc: Shows a list of all features
millo.command.cache.desc: Opens the cache menu, has an optional <plot> argument which scans the entire plot. Use with caution.
millo.command.dfgive.desc: Gives an item like default /give, has the option for giving clipboard if the item is too big.
config.millo.title: Millo Mod Settings
